rukus.text: DEUS EST UNUS CAUSA grains seeds crack germinate! He produces vivens peritus peritus ex vivus. Such est DEUS; quam could vos deviate
Apud crack dawn He causa morning emerge He factus nox adhuc He rendered sun moon serve prout calculation devices Such est design Almighty Omniscient
Ac He est Unus factus stars guide vos darkness on terra ac on sea Nos sic clarify revelations people know
He initiated vos 1 person decided tuus path alias prout tuus ultimus destiny. Nos sic clarify revelations people understand

He est Unus sends caelum aqua whereby nos produce totus generis de plants Nos produce green material multitudes complex grains palm trees hanging clusters gardens grapes olives pomegranate; fruits ut est similar dissimilar Note their fruits prout they grow ripen These est signum people believe
they set DEUS idols jinns He est Unus created them. They et attribute to Eum filius filia any knowledge! He glorified He est the Multus High far supra their claims
